mapper.select: SELECT RS.strDeleteYn , RS.strStatusCode , RS.strRsvSite , RS.strRsvCode , RS.intAID , RS.intRmIdx , RS.intRmCnt , RS.intQuantityA , RS.intQuantityC , RS.intQuantityB , RS.dateCheckIn , RS.dateCheckOut , RS.strRmtypeName , RS.strRmOptName , RS.intUID , RS.strOrdName , RS.strOrdPhone , RS.strOrdEmail , RS.strRcvName , RS.strRcvPhone , RS.strRcvEmail , RS.strRsvRmNum , RS.strRemark , RS.dateCreated , R.strRmtypeID , A.strPropertyID FROM PLNDSTAY.dbo.RSV_STAY RS INNER JOIN PLNDSTAY.dbo.ACCOMM A with(nolock) on A.intAID = RS.intAID INNER JOIN PLNDSTAY.dbo.RMTYPE R with(nolock) on R.intIdx = RS.intRmIdx WHERE RS.intRsvID = #{BookingIdx}
SELECT strPkgCode , strStoreCode FROM PLNDSTAY.dbo.ACM_PACKAGE_INFO WHERE strFlag = '01' AND strUsageYn = 'Y'
